summary: Completed comprehensive testing of view toggle functionality (grid/list) for Ferre Inti online store. All main functionality working perfectly across CategoryPage, SearchPage, OffersPage, BestsellersPage, and NewProductsPage.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 404 with 'Producto no encontrado' instead of empty results
minor_bugs.impact: Search functionality not working, but doesn't affect main view toggle testing

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 404 with 'Producto no encontrado' instead of empty results
minor_bugs.impact: Search functionality not working, but doesn't affect main view toggle testing

design_issues.issue: Multiple console warnings about duplicate keys in React components
design_issues.details: Keys like 'cat_manual', 'prod_001' appearing as duplicates during re-renders
design_issues.impact: No functional impact, just console warnings

passed_tests: CategoryPage view toggle functionality - Grid/List switching works
OffersPage view toggle functionality - Grid/List switching works
BestsellersPage view toggle functionality - View toggle present
NewProductsPage view toggle functionality - View toggle present
SearchPage view toggle functionality - View toggle present
Product display in grid view - Products shown correctly in grid format
Product display in list view - Products shown correctly with image, name, description, rating, price
Navigation to product page from grid view - Working correctly
Navigation to product page from list view - Working correctly
View toggle buttons with correct data-testid attributes - All present and working
Backend API endpoints (84.6% success rate) - Categories, products, offers, bestsellers, new products all working
